name: Test
description: Try inputting this flag: flag{TestCTF_is_so_cool}

name: Inspection
description: There is a flag hidden in the code for this webpage! Can you find it?

name: SQL Injection 1
description: Do you know what an SQL Injection is? ???

name: Cipher 1
description:
My old friend Caesar gave me this one. Can you crack it?

pvkq{mkockb_gkc_cy_myyv}

name: Somewhere in the Server
description: There is a flag hidden in flag.txt on the server! Can you find it?

name: ask ee
description:
In the computing industry, standards are established to facilitate information interchanges among American coders. Unfortunately, I've made communication a little bit more difficult. Can you figure this one out?

66 6C 61 67 7B 34 35 43 31 31 5F 31 35 5F 55 35 33 46 55 4C 7D

I accidentally encoded my flag in a certain base. Help me get it back.

ZmxhZ3tiQTUzX3MxeDd5X0YwdVJ9

name: Cipher 2
description:
Caesar gave me another cipher, but this time it's one that his friend Susbtitution made. Can you crack this one?

VQPC{G_QJDB_PKBRGXP}

Here's some text that is ciphered using the same key. Also, the flag is all caps.

name: Data is cool
description: There is a flag hidden in this file! Can you find it? asdf.jpg

name: Troll
description:
Here's a free flag.
flag{s0ca83am8e0_f2iodjf2o3jal;ad32r#$ajkdf$ajafkl2fakjdl$adfaDa13adf4FAF3rja2#Radfdf2}

name: What the File 1
description:
A mystery person gave me this file. I don't know what it is but he said there's a flag inside. Can you help me get it?
Here's the file: flag.zip
Hint: Check for a file signature.

name: Client Side
description: I can't seem to authenticate on this site. Can you help me?

name: Taste the Rainbow Table
description:
Here's a hash: c055588e18df56f877f3c3ca73790ecd What is the original text?
Hint: Perhaps a table of rainbows would help.

name: exif
description: If only the flag were in the image... exif.jpg

name: POSTing
description: Something's wrong with this site. HALP

name: Tweeter
description: I recently tweeted a flag. My username is AYoip1115. Can you find the flag?

name: Tasty Cookies
description:
Help me get into my friend's website. He said cookies are tasty and comments might help.
Hint: What are cookies, and what's in the comments?

name: What the File 2
description:
The mystery person gave me another file. I don't know what it is but he said there's a flag inside. Can you help me get it?
Here's the file: a.wim

Hint: You shouldn't need to change any extensions for this one!

name: Inspection 2.0
description: There's actually another flag hidden on this website! (perhaps in a script). I think this one is pretty troll.

name: Digital Camouflage
description:
We need to gain access to some routers. Let's try and see if we can find the password in the captured network data: data.pcap.
Hint: The flag is the router password. It doesn't have flag{} around it.

name: go aHeader
description:
Help me get into this site. It seems that you need certain things to get in.
Hint: What are HTTP Headers?

name: Port Scanning
description: I'm running a lot of services on this server, but the one with the flag for this challenge is serving a minecraft resource pack. Can you find it?

name: RSA
description: What is RSA? Austin has these giant numbers. The flag is supposedly encrypted in here. Can you help me get it? rsa.txt

name: chrislang
description: I made this esolang called chrislang, and this program prints out the flag. I might have put an implementation on GitHub somewhere...

name: Python Calculator
description:
Here's a simple calculator in Python. It runs in the /calc directory, which also contains a flag.txt. Can you find the flag?
Here's the source if you want to take a look: calc.py
